samanya brahmacharya wen da ekthara pramanayekin me aanisansa labenu atha. 1.hathuran nathi bawa. 2.sarwajanapriyabhawaya. 3.aahara pana sulaba bawa. 4.sapa se nindana bawa. 5.thiyunu nuwanathi bawa. 6.apaya bhayin midunu bawa. 7.purushayaku nam sthriyaka nowana bawa ha sthri purusha depasa ma pandaka napunsaka nowana bawa. 8.nokipena bawa 9.owunowunata priya bawa. 10.paripurna indriyayan athi bawa hewath indriyayan wikala nowana bawa. 11.wirupa nowima men ma surupabhawaya. 12.suwa se prithiyen wasaya karana bawa yana aadiya yi.

gurukam washayen gathayuthu wu wada pinisa pawathna yamak ka wisin liya ewana laddath, mita athulath kota achchu gassannemu.”batuwanthudawe rajakiya pandithuma “yathalaba sangarawa” ganayi 1854 warshaye juni masaye nikuthkarana lada “shasthralankaraya” mehi palakara athi lipiya kotasak meseya.“subenoweyi yathalaba sangarayaspothata thabu nam kara aleibema kohomada padinama gaththelajja nathi hiralu ralelabe ya garahum ada wanathuru ara“pasidupatha”ta pasugiya kalenumbae tharam api wadiyen nokiyamuidithoth rata wena aya wale“yathalaba sangarawa” yayi kiyanneyam yam laba ekkara gana mayethakota rale oya potha pissigepala malla ha sama we maykatha karala oya potha nam thabuwehiralu gon kolamak thamayhitha udanguwa pandi nama aragaththahitha wenwa honda wihiluwa mayyam yam laba yathalaba, labunu yamak ya.
